name: Amethawk
description: Amethawk is an enigmatic pokemon shrouded in mystery. A majestic and majestic presence, it is shrouded in an aura of tranquility and mystery. Its brilliant, amethyst-colored gemstones gleam in the darkness of its preferred cave-like habitats, giving it an ethereal appearance that astounds all who come across it. With its powerful, psychically-charged wings, it soars through its domain, creating psychotropic waves of energy that ripple through the air. It lives a contemplative life, ever searching for deeper understanding of its mysterious powers.
image_prompt: a massive mythical psychic-type hawk pokemon::2.5, wearing amethyst gemstones, in a cave environment, pink bokeh lighting, polished final by studio ghibli --niji --ar 3:2
